texts.text: The small fish swims in circles.
The small fish bit the fig.
The small fish digs a big pit in the thick mud.
The small fish sees the big toy ship.
The small fish hid in the little pit.
The small fish sits in the little pit.
The small fish slips into the pit.
Look at the tiny fin on the fish.
Oh no! The small fish has chipped its fin.
The big fish comes to small fish.
“Sorry, kid” the big fish said to the small fish.
The small fish grins. “Thank you big fish!
